belongs_to_collection.name: One Cut of the Dead Collection

original_title: カメラを止めるな！スピンオフ『ハリウッド大作戦！』
overview: Six months passed since the horrible zombie attack. Chinatsu lost her voice after the incident and she now works as a waitress in Hollywood and is about to start a new life. However, real zombies arrive and terrorize the crew in Hollywood.
title: One Cut of the Dead Spin-Off: In Hollywood
